alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Dorchester; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:28PM EST until January 09 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON...DORCHESTER AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 328 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smoaks to near Tarboro, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Walterboro, Ridgeland, Saint George, Yemassee, Givhans Ferry State Park, Dorchester, Cottageville, Harleyville, Reevesville, Smoaks, Williams, Coosawhatchie, Ruffin, and Gardens Corner. This warning includes the following interstates: I-26 between mile markers 171 and 186. I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 23 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure, such as a basement or small interior room.
